name: yasm
description:
Yasm is a complete rewrite of the NASM-2.11.06 assembler. It supports
the x86 and AMD64 instruction sets, accepts NASM and GAS assembler
syntaxes and outputs binary, ELF32 and ELF64 object formats.

dependencies.name: autoconf
dependencies.description: Autoconf -- system configuration part of autotools

dependencies.name: automake
dependencies.description: Automake -- make file builder part of autotools

dependencies.name: libtool
dependencies.description: libtool -- library building part of autotools.

dependencies.name: m4
dependencies.description: GNU M4 is an implementation of the traditional Unix macro processor.

dependent_to.name: aom
dependent_to.description: Alliance for Open Media AOM AV1 Codec Library

dependent_to.name: ffmpeg
dependent_to.description:
FFmpeg is a complete, cross-platform solution to record, convert and
stream audio and video.

dependent_to.name: libvpx
dependent_to.description:
libvpx is a free software video codec library from Google and the
Alliance for Open Media. It serves as the reference software
implementation for the VP8 and VP9 video coding formats, and for AV1 a
special fork named libaom that was stripped of backwards compatibility.
